comments: I liked him a lot. He was funny and helpful. His e-mails were the best. They made everything so clear. I knew exactly what he wantted. I hate profs who try to confuse you. He\'s the only prof who cared enough to help you that much. He\'d tell us my goal is get you to pass. And I did thanx to him.

I had him for business writing...he is a tough grader but at the end if he likes you, you will do well. Be careful, because if he likes you he will constantly email you. He is kiinda creepy...but nice, just stay on his good side!
